website_summaries.verdict: Good for the pet owner who wants to wash their pet either inside or outside. Attaches to utility sink or shower pipe inside or garden hose.
pros: Powerful spray, quickly rinses away dirt and shampoo
Unique water comb sprays for maximum cleaning of thick coats
cons: No on-off switch, must be near faucet to end session
Some say it should be used with a garden hose for best results

customer_reviews.title: I love this Dog Wand
customer_reviews.text: Opened it, unscrewed the tip off my laundry room rink, screwed this into it, and bam! Ready to go There is blue toggle on the top of the wand to adjust the pressure, but it never shuts off. I thought this might be bothersome but it kept my little dogs warm while I shampooed them. I might go to the hardware store and get the fitting they offer with this wand; the double headed spout the let's you have a normal sink without unscrewing everything. Other than that I love this! This was the perfect size for my frenchies too.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: the tube end connected to the water faucet leaks
customer_reviews.text: The neck end that connects to the water faucet adapter leaks when connected to the adapter and the adapter connects to the water faucet,. I did not like the fact that I had to buy a black washer that was placed into the neck connector of the tubing as the washer that came with it was very thin and caused the leak. I had to spend my own extra money to fix the leak. Also the sprayer has no shut off valve and the minimum when paused too much water is coming out not as shown on the video. Overall I would not buy it again. The only good thing is the spray when turned on fully works well.
customer_reviews.author: el tigre

customer_reviews.title: Get this!
customer_reviews.text: For the past two years I used a handheld shower head to bathe the dogs in the tub. It never had the right amount of pressure and the hose was too short to reach the bottom of the tub. The Waterpik Pet Wand greatly exceeded all of my expectations! This product will make future baths a much easier task. It is very easy to install and you can adjust the pressure level.
customer_reviews.author: Graphic_Designer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for washing dogs...found solution to water shut-off issue.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the wand and use it on both of our 55# dogs. Only issue, and the reason for the 4-star rating, is that it does not shut off completely. I initially found that I had to put it in a 5 gal. bucket to save the water (we were in a drought). However, I did find a work around and purchased a shut-off adapter on Amazon for $11 and it works GREAT so now I can stop the water whenever I want. :0) ( Problem solved!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce T.

customer_reviews.title: wow! wow! wow!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just simply amazing. I could easily connect it to both my bathroom sink and my shower head. Took only seconds to hook it up. You can really feel the quality of the product while holding it (not some cheap plastic feel) and the adjustable water pressure is easy to use with one hand. I'm so happy I purchased this! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for bathing big mutts
customer_reviews.text: This is super handy for bathing my 50 lb mutt. She has thick poodle hair and this wateripick gets right through all her fur into her skin. It cuts our rinsing time to nothing. The spray has different settings so you can spray full force on the thicker areas and less forcefully on their delicate areas like faces and ears. I attach it to the outdoor hose. My only complaint is that I have to turn the hose off everytime I set this down, there's no off button on the product itself unless I'm too dumb to find it. Totally possible.
customer_reviews.author: M. McPerez

customer_reviews.title: Hate the mess of bath time?? Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok...this thing makes bathing my pup the fastest I have EVER bathed him. Trash the whole fill up a cup with water and dump it on him!! This makes bathing a breeze! And it makes clean up super fast and easy! So glad I found this product!! I also got the mushroom hair stopper (different product) and bathing and clean up is a snap! 5 stars! Bentley approves! On a side note....other uses include: washing your hair, last minute shaving your legs, washing your car....cause the power on this thing can be soft for your pup or strong for your car!!
customer_reviews.author: OMG3ecky!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with a modification or two!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing! It's as good for cleaning the shower as it is for washing the dog, and I love that you can turn the water off using the lever when you don't need it. After reading others reviews stating that the plastic would crack when they placed and removed it, I bought the "delta shower arm diverter" (basically a splitter that allows you to direct water to this or your showerhead) so that I could just leave it in the shower and use it as needed. I highly recommend this product and this solution to having to take it off all of the time and risk cracking the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: AndiSchu

customer_reviews.title: Why was it in my closet for 8 months!!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this in April (it's Dec) and our property is pretty muddy. For whatever reason I never took it out of the packaging. Well every time my GSD goes out to play her undercarriage is muddy and I have to rinse her off. I finally pulled it out and what a game changer!!! I can give her a quick underside rinse several times a day without having to get her whole body wet. The water pressure has two settings and it's really good. My only comment is that I wish it had an on-off valve not a low/high valve. I LOVE it and will get another for my vacation property.
customer_reviews.author: vinobear

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better, more flexible hose!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, it made bathing the monsters easier, the CBD oil didn't hurt either... :) Easy to install and design of wand, made it super easy to clean under tummy. My only issue with this pet wand is the relatively stiff hose. It made it hard to maneuver and kept hitting the dogs underbelly. Way too stiff for the job. I would gladly pay more for a flexible steel hose like they sell for the garden. I've got one and it works wonderful! Never kinks and lays down nicely, wouldn't hit the tummy. Easier to store also! I would upgrade to that, should they ever offer it.
customer_reviews.author: Teanuty

customer_reviews.title: I have a 70 lb 9 month old goldendoodle, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 70 lb 9 month old goldendoodle, and he was so difficult to bathe in our apartment! It would take peanut butter on the walls, both my fiance and I, and about 3 huge cups of water going at all times. This is an absolute lifesaver. It has even lowered the amount of shampoo we need for him, and cut his bathing time at least in half!
customer_reviews.author: kayla1252

customer_reviews.title: No off switch
customer_reviews.text: This works great when washing my dog but there is no switch to stop the water from coming out when you are lathering the soap. It wastes unnecessary water. The switch comes in two settings: high power or low flow. Makes life easier when washing the dog but it would be better if you can stop the water flow completely.
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: Works well for dogs and cleaning showers
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs are much less scared of this than any other sprayer we have tried. The adjustable pressure works good. Being able to aim the water in one direction makes rinsing out soap easy. Besides using on dogs, it also works good for rinsing down shower walls. The hose seals very easily without even needing to screw it on super tight.
customer_reviews.author: haggis

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure and ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: I saw a friend use a similar product and had to have it to wash my dogs outside. Connected easily to outdoor hose and had much better water pressure than expected! Curved shape made it user friendly over body of the dog - over the back and under the belly. I was only disappointed that the lever on the handle was for water pressure adjustment - I thought it could shut the water on and off. :( I've only used it once but I like the product and it was very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Black

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the rubber shower attachment I had been using to bathe my dog kept falling off the faucet, spraying water everywhere. This fastens very securely and I can leave the adapter on the faucet all the time without any problem. I gave it 4 stars only because it would be nice to be able to turn the water off completely when needed. This only allows me to lower the pressure which is fine too. The lower pressure is fine for my small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne S

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Pik quality
customer_reviews.text: Hose sprung a leak in the middle (not the fittings) - blew a hole through inner hose and outer sheath. Lasted 8 months. Also, you can't shut it off at the handle - you have to turn the water completely off, which sucks if you've finally got the temp where you want it. And lastly, the hose is super stiff and so it wants to spray everywhere. 1/10 do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took a minute to get the right connection.
customer_reviews.text: It took me a couple of tries to get the right connection so that it wasn't leaking. I'm using it attacked to a faucet on a utility sink in my laundry room, so I need to be able to attach it when washing the dog and them removing it. It works but it is a bit more complicated than I'd hoped. When it comes to washing to dog, it does just fine. I'm sure it will be OK once I get used to which part needs to be screwed on in which order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bath time is SO much easier!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I LOVE this product. We have a standard dachshund and have been giving him baths in the bathtub, but it's so difficult to make sure all of the shampoo is out of his fur because there's no extendable shower head in our house. This attached directly to the faucet and had so much cleaning power!! Our dog didn't appear to mind it and actually appeared to be enjoying bath time! We had to flip a coin to see which of us got to bathe our dog first with this wand because it's so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Claire E Cordray

customer_reviews.title: Puppies and Babies love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on our German Shepherd puppy. What I didn't expect was how much my son (1 year old) loves it too! Lol When we bath him each night, we would use the tried and true "cup" method to rinse his hair and get soap off him. We had this wand hooked up in the tub that night so my husband used it instead. Our son loved holding it and spraying himself, and since you can manually turn it down to a trickle, it worked perfectly. My husband will still switch our normal shower head out for this wand for bath time.
customer_reviews.author: REP

customer_reviews.title: I love my pet wand
customer_reviews.text: I love my pet wand! I used it the day I received it on my lab puppy and, here’s the real test, my standard rough collie. It cut through my collie’s hair like magic! The wand also came with plenty of length to reach from the sink faucet to the bathtub. Now if it could only lift my 65 pound dog into the tub for me...
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Washing your dog made easy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the "pet wand", and pretty much works as described. Really rinses fast, and thorough. I would have given it a 5 star rating, but you cannot turn the water off completely while you work in the shampoo, so there is some water waste Otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Veightford

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wand! Strong stream and i love the curve and it’s comfortable to hold. I have two small dogs and this works really well for them. Cuts down on anxiety, i have a dog who freaks out for baths, using this was enjoyable for him and myself, he didn’t freak out at all. Wahes awAy soap so much faster cutting bath time. The only thing i wish this wand had was an off switch to water flow. Other then that totally worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Font what it seems
customer_reviews.text: This is fine if you wish to remove your shower head every time you use it but you have to order the diverter desperate as you do with the do hicky to hang the spray on the wall Way below what one would expect from Water Pic I would NOT recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: GW Mc Donald Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bathing Small Dogs in the Sink
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wand to bathe my elderly mom's two small Shih Tzu dogs. The water stream is strong enough to thoroughly rinse the body, but can be lowered for rinsing the head and face. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LMac

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I have a long hair & a short hair dogs. This was able to rinse both othe their coats completely clean of shampoo in way less time than even my showerhead inside! With the low pressure I was able to wash & rinse their faces without too much drama (they both hate water on their faces). Highly recommend! Do you make a human equivalent?
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hate the groomer but will calmly let me wash them in the tub. I love that I can adjust the pressure and now they can have warm water vs outside baths. The only gripe, I have is that I can't attach it to the bathtub bc the spout is deep. I have to attach it to my sink and pull it to the bathtub. The additional adapters are nice, but don't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it does
customer_reviews.text: The water pressure is impressive that comes out of the wand. I am able to push the shampoo off my dog very easily, and he loved the water pressure. My one complaint which is why I didn't give the wand 5 stars is that there is no turn off mechanism that I could find. I would have to turn the wand on the lowest setting and position the wand away until I was ready to use it. Other than this the product is great and would recommend to other people.
customer_reviews.author: SamboWalks

customer_reviews.title: Great shower and less mess.
customer_reviews.text: Nice powerful spray that helps get under the fur. Mult adapters are provided for bathtub, shower, outdoor connection. It leaks a bit and it does not turn fully off with the slide control. Thats why I gave it 4 stars. For the money and the job it does, I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A. Riccardi

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Hooked the sprayer up on my utility sink. I used the metal utility sink adaptor that come with the pet wand. As soon as I turned on the water the water was leaking out of the metal utility sink adaptor. Bottom line poorly made. I went to the hardware and purchased two additional rubber to stop the leak.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I’m happy with the results. My dog hates baths and this cut down the bath time to about 10 minutes and she seemed to not fight it as much. You can adjust the pressure from low to really high. It removes the soap all the way through on high pressure. I read that some people were having problems with the washers. I didn’t have that issue, I just pressed the washers into place and I didn’t have any leaks. I wash my dog outside so if it did leak it wouldn’t matter to me because my dog shakes all the water off and I get wet anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty equipment
customer_reviews.text: This came as an open box and didn’t have the rubber washers installed to make it not spray water all over my kitchen. It was a terrible purchase and there is no customer support. Bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: allain h.

customer_reviews.title: Bath time / fun time
customer_reviews.text: Well, maybe not -- he still doesn't like a bath. But it makes bathing our 10 pound Cairn Terrier/Poodle mix so much easier than trying to hold him under a faucet. We will also be taking this with us camping in case we need it. If we camp near the beach, it may be our feet that need it!
customer_reviews.author: B and B

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It's what I wanted, but the plastic connectors spray water all over the place. I had to go back to my old sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: njani

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning stuck stuff off of baby bibs, diapers, and linens before laundering. IT IS AMAZING! Makes the job tons easier and neater! I would also use it to bathe my critters, if they were not short haired and low maintenance types. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ember J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Equine Helper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help when I bathe my horse. He has thick, soft hair that doesn’t rinse easily. This wand really helped get down to the skin level. Even just as a tool for rinsing, you could see the amount of dirt and sweat it removed. It also has an adjustable flow, so you can spray more sensitive areas. The one drawback is it does not have an on/off, so be sure to be near your faucet. I would recommend this for all your fuzzy friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Chupka

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, but broke less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for bathing dogs throughly. I was disappointed that in less than 6 months, the lever that you use to change water pressure, water keeps spraying through it. So trying to give the dogs a bath, I am also giving myself one. It is nice to that it has different water pressures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing for my little Frenchies
customer_reviews.text: I have two French Bulldogs and this works perfectly for washing my stinky little pups. They tend to get out and really get dirty and this little shower tool gets right down to the skin without hurting them. they love it, like a massage.
customer_reviews.author: misty mccrary

customer_reviews.title: Bath time got so much better!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and a life-changer! also, somehow it has made the water pressure stronger. It's a breeze to use and the ability to turn off the water at the end makes bathing my dog so much easier. It's also surprisingly quiet, so my dog doesn't get as scared of being bathed. Excellent! highly recommend it for pet owners. It is also great for when I dye my hair and have to wash it in the tub. Just an added bonus ;)
customer_reviews.author: violynn

customer_reviews.title: Saves loads of time.
customer_reviews.text: Really made a big difference in how long it took to wash our German Shepard plus I feel like I did a much better job because the wand got everywhere. (Even those underneath bits that are sensitive.) It made both of us much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower for the doggies!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Stream is either very strong or very soft, and everything in-between. Does not shut off completely, lowest setting is a trickle. The hose is nice and long but relatively stiff. You have to fight with it a bit. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: The dogs do not really like bath time, but this wand made it so much easier! It allows for better water distribution per unit area of dog fur so the baths go faster. It was really easy to install on the end of the garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for baths
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for giving my dogs baths. I connected it to my outside hose and it has great pressure. Gets deep into their fur and gets debris out. I have 2 Labs who love to swim and a murky pond on my property. This has been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: If you wash your dog in the shower this is for you (and your dog).
customer_reviews.text: Without reservation this is the best dog shower. Volume control allows precise control when washing the dog. Gets down into the coat or just for light rinsing. Long hose is a bonus. If attached in the shower you most likely have to remove the shower head or get an attachment that allows for this item and your normal shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Codder

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for my dog who doesn't want to be "squirted". I can glide it smoothly over his coat letting its jets force the soap and dirt right out. I can put the water exactly where I want it, and as forceful as I want it. This is 3X easier than using the showerhead. The dog responds to it like he's being petted; he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect find! I feel like I’m blasting away any bugs that may be preying on my dog. Lowest pressure is perfect for my dog’s head while highest is great for washing out all the shampoo. Cuts bath time in HALF! Comes with two attachments great for summer days when I need to rinse my dog outside. I saw a review someone posted where the connected piece from hose to facet didn’t fit I had the same problem BUT I just used the outdoor attachment and problem solved NO BiGGIE! Great investment! Dog loves it and now gets excited for baths!
customer_reviews.author: Arianny

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest product ever invented! Screwed right onto the faucet, no leaks and great water pressure. It even has the option to lower the eater pressure or you can shut the water off completely using one hand. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: jcoy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend, I love it! Regret not buying it long ago.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I purchased this 2 years ago!! So easy to bathe my 2 German Shepherds. Plenty of hose length for inside shower. Can't wait to be able to bathe/rinse them outdoors, when it warms up! Mud season and this go hand to hand!!
customer_reviews.author: K.addicted.to.amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Best product for dog wash
customer_reviews.text: My dog trainer saw the package on my counter and said that product is amazing. I got so tired of hurting my back and struggling to wash large dogs at home, so I have been paying 20 to do self washes at local pet shops. Never again... this product works so well!! My dog gets spooked easily and was never a fan of a bath, but he tolerated this better than anything and it was so easy to get all the soap off. Excellent product that I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: patricia kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaving
customer_reviews.text: This item is an absolute lifesaver. My 3 pups decided to play tug, roll and feast on a dead gopher. They were horrible and quite aromatic and not in a pleasant way. This tool enabled my husband and I to thoroughly bathe all 3 dirty dogs in about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you want to bath your pets at home!
customer_reviews.text: This makes bathing my dogs in the utility sink 1000% better!! It was difficult to bath them with a bowl pouring water on them a single fillip at a time. I was able to easily rinse them off under their belly over their head front and their bums. They still didn’t like their baths but they were a tad bit calmer. Definitely recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scrappys Mom

customer_reviews.title: Once you replace the washer it will work great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to use in the shower however you will need to probably retrofit it so that it doesn't leak everywhere. I had to swap out the washer with an 8.5 by 18 by 4 mm rubber washer in order for it not to gush water all over my shower at the connection point. Once I put in a decent quality washer the product and worked very well. Much easier more efficient and faster than bringing the dog to a groomer or self washing dog place. Huge Time Saver.
customer_reviews.author: Alex John Ricciardone

customer_reviews.title: No pause feature
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product and connected to checked how it works. I liked everything except the part of the pause. The video mentioned that you can pause to able to use both hands to shampooing the pet but there is no way to do it. I went all the way to both sides and even push a little bit looking for the pause and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Anaeli Roldan-Armaiz

customer_reviews.title: Does not turn off$$$
customer_reviews.text: I did not know when I purchased this wand, that it did not shut off unless I turned off the hose.My dog wash station is 20 feet from the garden hose valve. Is mine defective?
customer_reviews.author: jrd111

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I could not ask for a better product for washing my dog. You can adjust the power of the water which I really like. It has pretty strong pressure - for my dog at full strength is a bit much but I can lower the pressure and I can pause the water while I wash her also - which is awesome! I feel like she is actually really clean and no residue after her bath!!! Love love love this wand!!! Every dog owner should have one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: My pup likes baths now!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for those whose dogs hate baths! It has an option to use a lower pressure so my pup did amazing with it and bath time was cut in half!! I’m now looking forward to bathing her.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: will continue to use the regular hand held shower
customer_reviews.text: This to me was a clumsy item to try and use. Have a regular handheld shower with water control button that works fine and will continue to use. Returned this item unused.
customer_reviews.author: notions

customer_reviews.title: Good pressure control and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Nice size...works great but wish it could connect to any sink like my bathroom sink. Other than that it has good pressure control and gets through my border collies thick coat very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I was using a small cup to rinse my Yorkie Terrier. This tool made the job much easier and less stressful on my dog. I am confident I am removing all of the shampoo from his coat and getting him completely clean.
customer_reviews.author: RLFCARS

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use especially using it on my dog that is water scared. She stood and took her bath with no problem. My other dog really enjoyed the bath also.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: The dog likes it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too bad I didn't get this sooner. It has a soft spray setting which is enough for my dogs bath. It's like running a water comb over her. It makes the bath process much more enjoyable for her and me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for DIY dog baths
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It really concentrates the water spray so that you can get right down to your pup's skin to remove any soap residue. It was very easy to connect to the garden hose for an outdoor bath. The flow control knob does not turn the spray off completely, but reduces it down to a trickle.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure
customer_reviews.text: This has good pressure and I love the rows of water streams to get across my dogs back and abdomen. I wish it had a pause button though. I got this one for the price though to see how well my dog would do with getting a bath outside. It comes with adapters and hooks up easy.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: All dog owner's need this!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to use, makes it a lot easier to bathe my dog. I use it in my kitchen sink to bathe my little dog and it works great. The only negative is I wish I could permanently leave it connected to my sink, easy to install but removing the parts can be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: Stiff tubing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product the only draw bAck is the tubing is really stiff which makes it hard to maneuver in a small space. It doesn’t fit the tub faucet so I use in the kitchen sink
customer_reviews.author: cheryl sokol

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for washing dogs and cleaning tub area
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed to simplify bathing our four small dogs. it works great, the flow control knob combined with the tub spigots allow a very fine control of pressure. Only issue was getting it hooked up to our tub faucet. It does leak slightly, but nothing that impacts using it.
customer_reviews.author: Party Steve

customer_reviews.title: Makes bath time so much easier!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog dislikes bath time since she was tiny and we’ve been trying to find ways to get her to like it. It has always been a battle to keep her from trying to jump out of the bath tub. We finally bought this because we thought it would make it easier for us to wash her. She finally sat in the tub on her own and just let us wash her. I think she likes the pressure of the water, maybe she feels like it massages her. Whatever it is. This definitely made bath tub easier for us and her.
customer_reviews.author: Skooby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Goldens swim every weekend in the river, which means they get a hose bath everyday they swim. This makes the fun of bathing these hairy beasts so much easier. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Full-Time Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, not many items that I LOVE. This is one of them. This a great water shower for your dogs. I bought the smaller one as I have small dogs. It works wonderfully. One swipe they are wet, another they are rinsed. Live, love this item!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom so she could have an easier time cleaning our dog Calvin. Helps with getting the water over him easily.
customer_reviews.author: Justin J.

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a game changer for days at the beach with our long haired dog. It is easy to install and allows for great water pressure to get all the beach sand out of long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My pup does not like the bath. This makes bath time a lot easier for sure. I wish there was an on/off button for the water flow, but there is not. You have to turn off the faucet, which makes things a little harder too, because I had to connect it at the bathroom sink. The length is plenty long though. It would probably work really great for smaller dogs that you can bath in the kitchen sink or a utility sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog that needs to be bathed twice a week for a skin condition. Before I purchased this I was never sure if she was rinsed well enough. This works well in my laundry tub with the outdoor faucet connection. She looks so much better, and I know she is rinsed well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Skies

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm wasting a lot of water while I lather ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could turn it on and off but you can only turn the pressure all the way down. I feel like I'm wasting a lot of water while I lather my dog. But it is super handy for breeds with double coats or coarse hair that seems to repel water. My big lab now deals with baths.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Woznak

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This has made bath time with our three big dogs so much easier. I have recommended it to my friends. This is a great product and I highly recommend it if you bathe your dogs yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: This makes giving my wire fox terrier a bath so easy! I highly recommend - it cuts down on time it takes to give her a bath and absolutely saves water. I love the adjustable strength of the water, the arch form helps direct the water, and get water in the hard to reach places that using a cup or hose doesn't always get. This is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: simple amazing!!!

customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: could be better

customer_reviews.author: Delia o.

customer_reviews.title: Good washer

customer_reviews.title: Best for well behaved, dirty dogs.

customer_reviews.author: Kevin McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product. Love it

customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this wand!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wand. Great power and easy to use. You can adjust the strength of the water spray just with your thumb. From a hard spray to nearly no flow.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Super performance
customer_reviews.text: The product exceeded all my expectations. It makes taking care of my Shit Zu, very simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed! We purchased a t connector and connected it to our shower. Worked like a charm! I recommend this product for your pet!

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable water flow

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom and dad approved (and wheaten approved!)
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents to wash their new puppy, a wheaten. They LOVE it and said it's the finest dog item they have!
customer_reviews.author: AZWarmer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Wish it had a way to cut it off completely. It allows for an adjustment of high or low water pressure but no way to turn off during the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my Shepherd husky mix and my pit mix
customer_reviews.text: Did not know what to expect but this is a life saver! Works perfect for my Shepherd husky mix and my pit mix. Wish I had this a long time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and super clean
customer_reviews.text: This wand is great! Takes weak water pressure and makes it more powerful. I was able to clean my dog all the way down to her down coat. I don’t think she has been this clean in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the back when used with sink faucet.
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint I have is the gaskets do not seal properly. When you turn the wand off with water pressure still on, water squirts out at connections. Left the wand open to avoid this. Otherwise, I really love it, and it is a back saver.

customer_reviews.title: Great little sprayer for smaller dogs

customer_reviews.text: This worked great. It made bath time a lot easier. I would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Light & Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, the best shower wand I've used for my dog. Very happy with it. Easy to wash out soap from my long, thick haired dog. Has the option to turn water off when lathering her & to lighten the water pressure when I am rinsing around her face. It's light weight & easy to handle. I love it!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This item works great. It gets the soap out of the dog's coat easily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KW of SC

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This wand makes bathing my Malshi easy! The water stream was very powerful. I used about half power. His hair is so thick it would take forever just to get him wet for the shampoo. I was never sure I had all the shampoo out when I rinsed him or not. This product make very quick work out of what use to be a dreaded chore! I hooked this up to my shower head and it worked just as it said it would. I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants a easy way to bathe their dog.
customer_reviews.author: AmBettazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Water Pressure!! No Soap Left Behind!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best rinser I've ever used. It attaches to my utility sink faucet and the range of water pressure is great. Full blast really gets the soap off the dogs. There is no off switch, but since I use it on my sink, I just turn off the faucet.
